articles.author: Jill Lawless
articles.title: England scraps quarantine for fully vaccinated visitors from U.S., but not Canada - CTV News
articles.description: Fully vaccinated travellers from the United States and much of Europe will be able to enter England and Scotland without quarantining starting next week, U.K. officials said Wednesday -- a move welcomed by Britain's ailing travel industry.
articles.content:
LONDON --

articles.title: 5G Phone Demand Grows Among Customers Planning to Buy New Models in the Next 6 Months: Kantar - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Over two third of customers purchasing a new smartphone in markets including the US, Europe, and China in the next six months prefer to buy a 5G phone, according to consulting firm Kantar. It was also found that there’s been a growing interest among customers…
articles.content: Over two-third of customers in major markets planning to purchase a new smartphone in the next six months prefer getting a 5G model, according to a report released by consulting firm Kantar. China le… [+3149 chars]
